subHeader: an html5 container build on Electron.
description: Increased security features and user permission settings.

sections.subHeader: explor some features of the OpenFin's API

subHeader: open, close and interact with child windows.
description: child windows share their parent renderer.

sections.subHeader: launch a new window from a parent application

subSections.content: try demo below to open a child window.
openWindow

sections.subHeader: close a window from a parent application

subSections.content: try demo below to open a child window that will close when the timer expires.
closeWindow

sections.subHeader: create child windows in the group of the parent window.

subSections.content: try demo below to create group.
groupWindows
try demo below to move the group.
(Not supported by OSX).
groupWindowsMoveyBy

subHeader: interact with windows using the OpenFin API
description: move windows to a location or by a specific amount. add animations to make movements smoother.

subSections.content: try the demo below to move the current window.
moveBy
try the demo below to move the current window to a fixed location.
moveTo
try the demo below to move the current window to a fixed location with an animation.
animate

description: communicate between windows using javascript memory.

sections.header: send data from child to parent
sections.subHeader: used shared memory to send data

subSections.content: try the demo below to send data to parent window.
sharedMemoryCommunication

description: emit event messages that can be subscribed to by other applicaitons and windows.

sections.subHeader: subscribe to data sent by other applications.

subSections.content: try the demo below to send data to a subscribed application.
interAppBusSubscribe
publish from the new window to send data to the original application.

sections.subHeader: publish data to other applications that are subscribed.

subSections.content: publish data through the bus to subcribers.
interAppBusPublish
